title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: The observed behavior is that the output of the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method is "MySomeAnn" instead of the expected "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected behavior is that the output should be "MySomeClass".
